Fully support iPhone X adaptation

[New Hero]Clone Bane—Star Wizard
Greedy and evil Star Wizard, even on doomsday, he willing to sacrifice souls to the dark to get the power. He can bring his enemies into fear and pain by summoning inferno fire. Under tempting conditions, Wizard has temporarily promised to join the heroes and help the heroes to destroy the zombies.

[New Server]War Elegy
Opens on January 12th, new fight on new battlefield! In the world crowded with Zombies, as a Doomsday Commander, you have to lead a team of super heroes to fight and survive.
